gate_guard_start.text: Halt! The city gate is closed by order of the Duke. No one enters without a Royal Pass.

options.text: Can't speak, I'm running from something!
[WARRIOR] Step aside, or I will move you myself.
(Bribe 10g) Surely we can look the other way?

node_enter_legit.text: Everything seems to be in order. Welcome to the capital, citizen.

node_intimidate_success.text: Whoa, easy there! I don't get paid enough to fight a walking tank. Go on, just make it quick.

node_bribe_success.text: *He quickly snatches the coins.* The Duke's orders are strict... but my eyesight is poor. Get in before I change my mind.

node_explain_lore.text: Monsters in the forest. Bandits on the road. The Duke says it's for 'public safety', but we all know he's just hoarding the grain.

options.text: I see. Let me try to enter again.
